entry.title: Thursday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 16 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 23 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow ending early in the morning then clearing. Local blowing snow. Wind becoming west 40 km/h gusting to 70 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 23 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 38 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
